text: Hagi Israeli vahera azeri agazonema hu agaho a' bulimakaomo'ma witi honama refuzafupe zanku'ma ave'nesiankna nehianki'na, zamana'zamana huno hentofaza hu'neaza anankempina karenamere zafa antegahue. Efraemina karenamare zafa anankempi ante'nugeno erizana enerina, Juda vahera hanugeno mopa rekonerinigeno, Jekopu naga'mo'za mopa rupopo hugahaze.
